_exec_summary.SummaryText:
This summary will list the support documentation used to compile the Attica Water Treatment Plant?s Risk Management Plan.

    Emergency call list            from section 4 of our Emergency Plan

    Chlorine Safety Procedures        from section 5 of our Emergency Plan

    Endpoint Map (1.3 mile radius)        from section 5 of our Emergency Plan

    Endpoint Address list            from section 5 of our Emergency Plan

To calculate our estimated resident population within our distance to endpoint we counted the households and then used Wyoming County and Village of Attica census records to arrive at our final number. The calculations used to develop the Alternative Release scenario were based on a chlorine regulator being knocked off of a full chlorine container. Our chlorine supplier (Jones Chemical) informed us that the flow through our container valve opened one half turn would be intermittent due to the freezing/thawing at that orfice. The leak could be stopped by a properly equipped operator by simply closed the container valve one half turn.
